features.file_size: Size of the executable in bytes
features.entropy: Shannon entropy of the file (0-8 scale, higher = more random/packed)
features.has_debug: Whether debug information is present (0 or 1)
features.packed: Whether the file appears to be packed (0 or 1)
features.api_calls: Number of unique API calls detected

classification_tips: High entropy (>7.0) often indicates packing or encryption
Low import count with high suspicious strings is a red flag
Legitimate software usually has debug symbols
Malware often has more sections than typical software
